message: <font color='#44c5ca'>Setting a goal</font> is a great way to start being active. Talk to your health provider about what is right for you.
<font color='#44c5ca'>Safety first!</font> Before you start being active on your own, make sure it is safe for you. Learn More.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – Safety First

message: There are lots of ways for patients with heart conditions to <font color='#44c5ca'>be active</font>. Learn More.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – Be Active

message: One way to improve your heart health is to participate in cardiac rehabilitation. <font color='#44c5ca'>Learn More</font>.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – Cardiac Rehab

message: It is usually recommended that people get at least 150 minutes of physical activity every week. <font color='#44c5ca'>Learn More</font>.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – How-To

message: Pushing yourself to work up a sweat while being active can improve your heart health. <font color='#44c5ca'>Learn More</font>.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness - Intensity

message: Sometimes it helps to have a fitness buddy. Is there a friend or family member who can help?
Engaging in at least <font color='#44c5ca'>moderate intensity</font> activities is best for your heart. Learn More.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness - Examples

message: Being active can improve your <font color='#44c5ca'>health</font> and <font color='#44c5ca'>mood</font>. Plus, it's <font color='#44c5ca'>fun</font>! Learn More.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness - Benefits

message: Taking the stairs or parking your car far away can help you to increase physical activity.
Varying your fitness routine can help keep you engaged. <font color='#44c5ca'>Learn More</font>.
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – Quick Tips

message: Setting goals can help you stay healthy. Are you meeting your fitness goals?
Did you know that people who are more physically active live longer?
You can count how many steps you take in a day to measure your activity. <font color='#44c5ca'>Learn More.</font>
actionMessage: Tap goes to Learn More – Fitness – Counting Steps

message: Reducing sedentary time (like watching TV) can have a powerful effect on improving health.
Making a plan to stay active over the long-term can help you to stay healthy.
